meanings: (뿔·머리 등으로) butt; (뿔로) gore; (부딪치다) hit, bump (into/against), ram (into), crash (into), smash (into)

examples.korean: He was excused by reason of his age. 발음듣기 그는 연령 때문에 용서[면제]를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was excused by reason of his age. 발음

examples.korean: The meat was condemned as unfit to eat. 발음듣기 그 고기는 식용으로 부적합하다는 판정을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The meat was condemned as unfit to eat. 발음

examples.korean: The work was acclaimed as a masterpiece. 발음듣기 그 작품은 걸작으로 칭송받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The work was acclaimed as a masterpiece. 발음

examples.korean: He was convicted at a court martial. 발음듣기 그는 군법회의에서 유죄 선고를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was convicted at a court martial. 발음

examples.korean: He was kept in custody for his own safety. 발음듣기 그는 그 자신의 안전을 위해 보호관리를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was kept in custody for his own safety. 발음
